items.title: Oxfam chief forced to step down after accusations of bullying
items.description: The charity's trustees say Dr Halima Begum's position was "untenable" following an independent review of her behaviour.

items.title: 'Hero' who wrestled gun from shooter named as Ahmed al Ahmed
items.description: Fruit shop owner Ahmed al Ahmed, 43, has undergone surgery for bullet wounds to his arm and hand.

items.title: Russia poses acute threat, new MI6 chief to warn
items.description: Blaise Metreweli will say the threat is posed by "an aggressive, expansionist and revisionist Russia".

items.title: Dozens killed in Morocco flash floods
items.description: At least 70 homes have been inundated in Safi's old city centre, officials say.

items.title: Sir Cliff Richard reveals prostate cancer treatment
items.description: The 85-year-old singer says his cancer has "gone at the moment", but calls for better screenings.
